name: A+ Baby Music - Nursery Rhymes
description:
Have you ever watched your kid getting curious near a real musical instrument? Now you can let your little one play and have fun with this awesome little app!

Simply download Baby Toy Guitar now and watch your kid get amused playing the Toy Guitar. We loaded the app with lots of popular nursery rhymes so that your baby can sing-along whilst playing the guitar!

Colorful buttons, smooth animations and playful music makes this app, ideal choice for kids to play with.

Some of the features include:

- Hand-picked and pre-loaded nursery rhymes lets your kid sing along with it.
- Bright and colorful Screens
- Lots of object to tap on and get amused by hidden animations!
- iPhone, iPad, iPod compatible!
- And much more!

Stay tuned! And please let us know if you have any suggestions for improvement.

The universal app is perfect for those with iPad whilst the iPhone version comes in handy whenever you need it.

Download the app today and unleash your little rockstar now!
